string-array.name: column_1
string-array.item: Payments over $600 required to be reported and\ndirect sales over $5,000(1)
Payments made in settlement of payment card\nor third party network transactions

string-array.name: column_2
string-array.item: THEN the payment is exempt for …
Exempt payees 1 through 4 and 6 through 11 and all C corporations. S corporations must not enter a\ncode because they are exempt only for sales of noncovered securities acquired prior to 2012.

string-array.name: table_2_column_1
string-array.item: IF the entity/person on line 1 is a …

• Individual
• Sole proprietorship, or
• Single-member limited liability company (LLC) owned by an individual and disregarded
for U.S. federal tax purposes.

• LLC treated as a partnership for U.S. federal tax purposes,
• LLC that has filed Form 8832 or 2553 to be taxed as a corporation, or
• LLC that is disregarded as an entity separate from its owner but the owner is another
LLC that is not disregarded for U.S. federal tax purposes.

string-array.name: table_2_column_2
string-array.item: THEN check the box for the …

Individual/sole proprietor or single member LLC
\ 
\ 
\

Limited liability company and enter the appropriate tax classification. (P= 
Partnership; C= C corporation; or S= S corporation)
\ 
\
